title: Things to discuss before breaking up
text:

So, things have come to such a pass in your relationship that you have no other choice but to break up. Of course, a lot depends on under what circumstances you have been compelled to make that drastic decision. Nevertheless, even if it's a mutual decision, discussing the following things in a calm and mature way can alleviate some of the pain and hurt:Obviously, it hasn't been roses, roses all the way. But talking about happy memories can help in dispelling some of the negative feelings you might be harbouring for each other. Talking about the positive things in your otherwise tumultuous relationship can also help you part amicably.This is the time when you can bring out in the open things that you have so far left unsaid. Listen to your partner present his side of the story. Request him to pay attention to what you have to say about your contribution as well.You might be sharing common space and other assets. Try to settle who can take what civilly and responsibly. Be practical and keep vendetta out of this matter.No matter how bitter the fight has been, rewind and relook at the issues that have been pushing you to the fence. The point is, making a last-ditch effort won't harm anyone.
description: You have decided to break up with your partner. But, wait, what if both of you are taking a rash step that? In that case, discuss these things first.
